pages.text: A next-generation $(6)cobblestone$() generator.$(br2)When supplied with $(6)60$()RF/t and both $(6)water$() and $(6)lava$(), it can be instructed to create certain materials.$(br)These materials can be further manipulated by actions:$(br)$(li)Smelting$(br)$(li)Crushing$(br)$(li)Crafting
